title: 04/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Kevin Durant suffering another injury and why this further solidifies his doubts about the Nets being a championship contender this year. He lobbies for one team in the top 5 to draft TE Kyle Pitts despite everyone calling for them to take a quarterback. He tells you why he was right about the Lakers and wrong about the Knicks. Plus, 2-time Super Bowl Champion Jimmy Johnson joins the show to share some insight on preparing for the NFL Draft.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
